app.py:
Page Title: app.py

Module Overview:

  Purpose: This module sets up a Flask application with a single route that returns a personalized greeting message based on the "name" query parameter in the URL.

  Dependencies: 
  - Flask: A micro web framework for Python.

Classes:
N/A

Functions:

  hello_world() -> str:
  - Purpose: Generates a personalized greeting message.
  - Arguments:
    - None
  - Returns:
    - str: A greeting message with the name provided in the query parameter or "World" if no name is provided.
  - Exceptions:
    - None
